doc:
Christina Kirk https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Christina_Kirk 0 Christina Kirk (born November 10, 1970) in New York, New York, is an American actress. She appeared in Woody Allen's Melinda and Melinda and Ira Sachs' Love Is Strange. She also was in Clybourne Park, a play by Bruce Norris. She was also a series regular on A to Z, and most recently played Jackie in the DC Comics TV series Powerless.She is married to screenwriter John Hamburg. Christina_Kirk ( born November_10_,_1970 ) in New_York , New_York , is an_American_actress . She appeared in Woody_Allen 's_Melinda_and_Melinda and Ira_Sachs '_Love Is Strange . She also was in Clybourne_Park , a_play by Bruce_Norris . She was also a_series_regular on A to Z , and most_recently played_Jackie in the_DC_Comics_TV_series_Powerless.She is_married to screenwriter_John_Hamburg .
